Events.OnCreate:
(switch ; This mission only works in Heretic (!= (sysGetNode) 'G2) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission (block Nil ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (orbitRadius (random 840 900)) (escortCount (random 6 8)) (angleInc (divide 360 escortCount)) (theAngle 0) theTarget theItem ) ; Create the Xenophobe Ark (setq theTarget (sysCreateShip &scXenophobeArk; (sysVectorRandom Nil orbitRadius 150 "TA") &svXenophobes; )) (shpOrder theTarget 'orbit (sysFindObject Nil "tN +star") orbitRadius)
; Remember and register for events (msnRegisterForEvents gSource theTarget) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID theTarget))
; Add the MacGuffin (setq theItem (itmCreate &itIocrymCyberneticTower; 1)) (objAddItem theTarget theItem) (msnSetData gSource 'itemRequired theItem)
; Create some defenders (for i 1 escortCount (block (theEscort) (setq theEscort (sysCreateShip &scXenophobeDefender; (objGetPos theTarget) &svXenophobes;)) (shpOrder theEscort 'escort theTarget theAngle 150) (setq theAngle (+ theAngle angleInc)) (for j 1 20 (block (theFighter) (setq theFighter (sysCreateShip &scXenophobeFighter; (objGetPos theEscort) &svXenophobes;)) (shpOrder theFighter 'patrol theEscort 15) ) ) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked:
(switch ; Only care about the player docking with owner while mission is active, ; so ignore anything else (or (!= aObjDocked gPlayerShip) (!= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) (not (msnGetProperty gSource 'isActive)) ) Nil
; If the player has docked with the Taikon station, and ; if they have the necessary item, then the mission ; succeeds. (objHasItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'itemRequired)) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'itemRequired)) (msnSuccess gSource) )
; If no object in the system has the tower, then the wreck must ; have been destroyed (or the player took it out system), so ; mission fails (not (filter (sysFindObject Nil "ts") theObj (objHasItem theObj (msnGetData gSource 'itemRequired)))) (msnFailure gSource) )

Language.Text:
A Xenophobe fleet has found an Iocrym artifact. Your mission is to destroy the fleet and bring the artifact back to the Taikon research outpost.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

A tall man in a corporate suit approaches you:
"Welcome to TVX-1! Taikon Ventures is out here in the Heretic system studying Iocrym technology. If you're interested, we could use your help. All your discoveries will be placed in the public domain through our Free Knowledge Foundation™."

"There is an Iocrym artifact in the system that could help us to learn much more about their technology. Unfortunately, a Xenophobe fleet found it before we could study it and now they are refusing to share it."
"The Xenophobes are a pest here in the Outer Realm—I don't think anyone will miss them if you destroy them and take the artifact back. Will you help us?"
"Wonderful! We'll give you the coordinates of the fleet. There are quite a lot of them, but you should be able to handle them with your weapons. I'm pretty sure."

"I understand. Killing a Xenophobe fleet is no small thing. But look at it this way: they would have no problem killing us. And ultimately, out here at the edge of Human Space, we're all alone. Think about it and come back when you change your mind."
Language.String: "Have you found the Iocrym artifact yet?"
Language.Text:
A group of Taikon scientists marvel over the Iocrym cybernetic tower. They immediately begin taking readings. The man in the corporate suit congratulates you:
"Thank you for helping us—this is the first close look we've had at this kind of Iocrym technology. I have no doubt that it will help us. We've recorded our scans on to this ROM, take it to Kate Morgental aboard the Svalbard Explorer."

As you turn to leave, the Iocrym cybernetic tower begins to emit a piercing high-pitched tone. Over the deafening screech you hear one of the scientists yell:
"It's sending out a high-frequency signal of some sort! I think it's a communications signal aimed at the outer system. My guess is that the Iocrym now know that we've got it!"

The man in the corporate suit holds his head in his hands:
"Without that cybernetic tower to study we've got nothing! How am I going to explain this to my VP?"

A tall man in a corporate suit approaches you:
"Welcome! When your current mission is complete, visit us again. We have a mutually beneficial proposition for you."
